sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.C_ID , A.C_PARENTID , A.C_POSITION , A.C_LEFT , A.C_RIGHT , A.C_LEVEL , A.C_TITLE , A.C_TYPE /* user filed add point*/
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_TITLE = #c_title# , C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_ARTICLE_ID = #articleId# , C_REG_ID = #regId# , C_VIEW_ONLY_REG_ID_FL = #viewOnlyRegIdFl# , C_REG_DT = #regDt# , C_MOD_DT = #modDt# , C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID = #rootCommentId# , C_IS_DELETED_FL = #isDeletedFl# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select:
/* getNode */
/* user fields */ , A.C_ARTICLE_ID as articleId , A.C_REG_ID as regId , A.C_VIEW_ONLY_REG_ID_FL as viewOnlyRegIdFl , A.C_REG_DT as RegDt , A.C_MOD_DT as modDt , A.C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID as rootCommentId , A.C_IS_DELETED_FL as isDeletedFl FROM T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT A WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

select.dynamic:
/* getNodeByRef */
/* user fields */ , A.C_ARTICLE_ID as articleId , A.C_REG_ID as regId , A.C_VIEW_ONLY_REG_ID_FL as viewOnlyRegIdFl , A.C_REG_DT as RegDt , A.C_MOD_DT as modDt , A.C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID as rootCommentId , A.C_IS_DELETED_FL as isDeletedFl FROM T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT A WHERE C_ID = #ref#

sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* enterMyselfFixLeftRight */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#) , C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#) , C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
sqlMap.insert:
/* addMyselfFromJstree */ INSERT INTO T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT ( C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL ) VALUES ( S_BOARD_TEST.NEXTVAL, #c_parentid#, #c_position#, #c_left#, #c_right#, #c_level# )
/* addMyselfFromJstree SEQ */ SELECT S_BOARD_TEST.CURRVAL AS SEQ FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: /* alterNodeType */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_TYPE = #c_type# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* fixCopyIF */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_POSITION = #fixCopyPosition# WHERE C_ID = #fixCopyId#
/* fixCopy */ UPDATE T_BOARD_$boardId$_COMMENT SET C_PARENTID = #fixCopyId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
, A.C_ARTICLE_ID as articleId , A.C_REG_ID as regId , A.C_VIEW_ONLY_REG_ID_FL as viewOnlyRegIdFl , A.C_REG_DT as RegDt , A.C_MOD_DT as modDt , A.C_ROOT_COMMENT_ID as rootCommentId , A.C_IS_DELETED_FL as isDeletedFl , A.boardId , A.boardName , B.c_title as regNickName FROM (
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Y.* , #tableInfo[].c_id# as boardId , #tableInfo[].c_title# as boardName FROM T_BOARD_$tableInfo[].c_id$_COMMENT Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.C_LEVEL > 1 AND Y.C_IS_DELETED_FL = '0' )
) A, T_USER_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND A.C_REG_ID = B.C_ID
AND B.C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#regNickName#||'%'
AND A.C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#c_title#||'%'
AND A.C_REG_DT BETWEEN #fromDt# AND #toDt#
ORDER BY C_ID DESC ) A ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND RNUM >= (1 + ((#pageNum# - 1) * #pageSize#)) AND RNUM <= (#pageNum# * #pageSize#)
